## Exercise 1

Select all the columns that start with `lsas` and the `id` and `group` columns.

```{webr}
#| exercise: ex_1

df_data |>
  select(______)
```

## Hints 

::: { .hint exercise="ex_1"}

Use `select()` and the `starts_with()` function.

```r
df_data |> 
  select(id, group, starts_with(______))
```
:::

## Solution

::: { .solution exercise="ex_1" }

The full solution is:

```r
df_data |> 
  select(id, group, starts_with("lsas")) #<1>

```
1. Select the `id`, `group`, and all columns that start with `lsas`.

:::
